summary: Implements a patch merging layer for Swin Transformer models. The layer receives a feature map with a specified spatial resolution and channel depth, optionally pads it to ensure even dimensions, groups neighboring patches, normalizes the concatenated features, and projects them to a higher-dimensional space, thereby halving the height and width while increasing the channel dimension.
